
# This file was generated by the build system used internally in the Yandex monorepo.
# Only simple modifications are allowed (adding source-files to targets, adding simple properties
# like target_include_directories). These modifications will be ported to original
# ya.make files by maintainers. Any complex modifications which can't be ported back to the
# original buildsystem will not be accepted.



add_library(dpdk-lib-librte_ring INTERFACE)
target_include_directories(dpdk-lib-librte_ring INTERFACE
  ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/contrib/libs/dpdk/config
  ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/contrib/libs/dpdk/lib/librte_ring
)
target_link_libraries(dpdk-lib-librte_ring INTERFACE
  dpdk-lib-librte_eal
  dpdk-lib-librte_kvargs
  dpdk-lib-librte_telemetry
)

add_global_library_for(dpdk-lib-librte_ring.global dpdk-lib-librte_ring)
target_compile_options(dpdk-lib-librte_ring.global PRIVATE
  -DALLOW_EXPERIMENTAL_API
  -DALLOW_INTERNAL_API
  $<IF:$<CXX_COMPILER_ID:MSVC>,,-Wno-everything>
)
target_include_directories(dpdk-lib-librte_ring.global PUBLIC
  ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/contrib/libs/dpdk/config
  ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/contrib/libs/dpdk/lib/librte_ring
)
target_include_directories(dpdk-lib-librte_ring.global PRIVATE
  ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/contrib/libs/dpdk/lib/librte_eal
  ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/contrib/libs/dpdk/lib/librte_eal/include
  ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/contrib/libs/dpdk/lib/librte_eal/linux/include
  ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/contrib/libs/dpdk/lib/librte_eal/x86/include
)
target_link_libraries(dpdk-lib-librte_ring.global PUBLIC
  dpdk-lib-librte_eal
  dpdk-lib-librte_kvargs
  dpdk-lib-librte_telemetry
)
target_sources(dpdk-lib-librte_ring.global PRIVATE
  ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/contrib/libs/dpdk/lib/librte_ring/rte_ring.c
)
